p: Hedyosmum brasiliense Mart. ex Miq. (Chloranthaceae) flowers and leaves were collected from male and female specimens at Parque Estadual da Ilha do Cardoso, São Paulo, Brazil (25°05′ S and 47°55′ W, 14 m alt) in September of 2015. The taxonomic identity was confirmed by Dr. Inês Cordeiro (Instituto de Botânica, São Paulo, Brazil). The voucher specimens were deposited in the Herbarium at the Instituto de Botânica, São Paulo, Brazil, with the accession No. SP 475335.
